andromeda.why: Keeps sovereignty over doubt—questions without ceding agency.

arcturus.why: Frames the hypothesis and paces the first tests—clean method.

draco.why: Early correctness-policing or ranky ‘who knows’ posturing.

lyra.why: Plain naming of the question keeps meaning receivable.

orion-dark.why: Grabbing doctrine to kill uncertainty rather than test it.

orion-light.why: Courage to hold inquiry without proving.

pleiades.why: Self-soothing regulates the pressure to know.

sirius.why: Private inquiry hygiene; no transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Chooses what to test; does not outsource the line of inquiry.

arcturus.why: Places doubt in the right scope, dataset, and timing.

lyra.why: Crisp phrasing trims ambiguity and aids reception.

orion-dark.why: Conforming to orthodoxy over authentic testing.

orion-light.why: Disciplined patience to let evidence ripen.

pleiades.why: Attuned support keeps the mind calm while evaluating.

sirius.why: Skilled placement, not yet protocol teaching.

andromeda.why: Victim/savior dynamics around ‘truth bringers’ outsource agency.

draco.why: Status gatekeeping and intimidation over who is ‘correct.’

orion-dark.why: Dogma used to suppress ambiguity and compel agreement.

orion-light.why: Lesson: reduce scope, slow down, validate stepwise.

pleiades.why: Appeasement to keep harmony biases the results.

andromeda.why: Frees inquiry from coercion; consent-based peer review.

arcturus.why: Builds test protocol—criteria, sequence, and review cadence.

draco.why: Fair thresholds filter bad-faith challenge and error.

lyra.why: Clear, spare framing lets conclusions land.

orion-dark.why: Process can ossify into rigid orthodoxy if over-fixed.

orion-light.why: Models integrity under pressure to produce answers.

pleiades.why: Attuned facilitation keeps minds/nerves regulated during review.

sirius.why: Teaches testing protocol by example—how to move from doubt to proof.

andromeda.why: Uses doubt to liberate from false claims and oppressive narratives.

arcturus.why: Sets standards for verification—claims, evidence, channels.

draco.why: Enforces loyalty to truth over optics or clique.

lyra.why: Distills the model/phrase that culture can carry cleanly.

orion-dark.why: Projection risk: canonizing ‘correct reading’ as dogma.

orion-light.why: Integrity to hold or release conclusions under pressure.

pleiades.why: Mentoring warmth supports adoption without enmeshment.

sirius.why: Instruction in logic standards—liberation through disciplined verification.

andromeda.why: Embodied freedom: lives with doubt or certainty without coercion.

arcturus.why: Establishes enduring canon for collective verification.

draco.why: Presence can read as a gate to ‘real correctness.’

lyra.why: Archetypal simplicity—few words carry the logical frame.

orion-light.why: Role-model courage to accept ambiguity or state truth precisely.

pleiades.why: Compassion is present without enmeshment in consensus.

sirius.why: Royal instruction: verification canon transmitted by presence/protocol.
